generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings and curbs, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian paths on both sides of the road, separated by curbs, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple residential buildings are visible along the street, including houses with different architectural styles.
- wall: A low stone wall is visible on the left side of the road, acting as a boundary.
- fence: A wooden fence is visible along the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from a garden.
- pole: Several utility poles are visible along the road, supporting overhead wires.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the road and in front of the houses.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible in front of the houses and along the sidewalks.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the road, including a silver sedan in the foreground and a white van further down the street.
